plot: Iñaki gets home. Fireworks shine through his windows and speak of another life. But he doesn't care anymore. He just wants to be on the sofa and avoid thinking. This is the story of Iñaki and his mourning.
title: Sin Lupe
plot_es: Iñaki gets home. Fireworks shine through his windows and speak of another life. But he doesn't care anymore. He just wants to be on the sofa and avoid thinking. This is the story of Iñaki and his mourning.
plot_en: Iñaki gets home. Fireworks shine through his windows and speak of another life. But he doesn't care anymore. He just wants to be on the sofa and avoid thinking. This is the story of Iñaki and his mourning.
